    Volunteering

    Volunteering and academic service experience:

    • RISE math tutor at Muir High School (2018-)
    • Microsoft Garage Internship Program mentor (2018)
    • Girls Who Code mentor (2017-2018)
    • DoD NDSEG (2017-) and NSF GRFP (2018-) reviewer
    • Board member of Women@NERD, the Microsoft Boston employee resource group for women (2017)
    • Reviewer for AspireIT, an institution funding local CS groups for girls (2016-)
    • Mock interviewer for local college students at Microsoft (2016-2017)
    • Freshman adviser to four Harvard College students (2015-2016)
    • Science fair judge at Braintree High School and Massachusetts State Science and Engineering Fair (2010-2016)
    • Research mentor to rotation (4), undergraduate (1), and high school (1) students (2010-2014)
    • Job-shadowing host for Acton-Boxborough High School AP Biology students
    • Student co-organizer and session chair at Harvard's Cells, Circuits, and Computation conference (2010-2013)
    • Teaching assistant in the Harvard Life Sciences Outreach Program (2010-2013)
    • Big Sister in the Big Sister Association of Greater Boston (2010-2012)
